---
slug: /sidebar/autogenerated

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Autogenerated

translations.zh-hant: # 自動生成
@@untranslatable_placeholder_efa96cff

segments.source_content: Docusaurus can **create a sidebar automatically** from your **filesystem structure**: each folder creates a sidebar category, and each file creates a doc link.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 能根據您的**檔案系統結構**自動建立側邊欄：每個資料夾會生成一個分類目錄，每個檔案則生成一個文件連結。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5564d81d

segments.source_content: Docusaurus can generate a full sidebar from your docs folder:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 可從您的文件資料夾生成完整側邊欄：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_41a8ae85

segments.source_content: An `autogenerated` item is converted by Docusaurus to a **sidebar slice** (also discussed in [category shorthands](items.mdx#category-shorthand)): a list of items of type `doc` or `category`, so you can splice **multiple `autogenerated` items** from multiple directories, interleaving them with regular sidebar items, in one sidebar level.

translations.zh-hant: `autogenerated` 項目會被 Docusaurus 轉換為**側邊欄片段**（亦於[分類速記法](items.mdx#category-shorthand)中討論）：由類型為 `doc` 或 `category` 的項目組成的列表，因此您可在單一側邊欄層級中，將**多個 `autogenerated` 項目**與常規側邊欄項目交錯拼接。

segments.source_content:
<details>
<summary>A real-world example</summary>

Consider this file structure:

```bash
docs
├── api
│   ├── product1-api
│   │   └── api.md
│   └── product2-api
│       ├── basic-api.md
│       └── pro-api.md
├── intro.md
└── tutorials
    ├── advanced
    │   ├── advanced1.md
    │   ├── advanced2.md
    │   └── read-more
    │       ├── resource1.md
    │       └── resource2.md
    ├── easy
    │   ├── easy1.md
    │   └── easy2.md
    ├── tutorial-end.md
    ├── tutorial-intro.md
    └── tutorial-medium.md
```

And assume every doc's ID is just its file name. If you define an autogenerated sidebar like this:

```js title="sidebars.js"
export default {
  mySidebar: [
    'intro',
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'Tutorials',
      items: [
        'tutorial-intro',
        // highlight-start
        {
          type: 'autogenerated',
          dirName: 'tutorials/easy', // Generate sidebar slice from docs/tutorials/easy
        },
        // highlight-end
        'tutorial-medium',
        // highlight-start
        {
          type: 'autogenerated',
          dirName: 'tutorials/advanced', // Generate sidebar slice from docs/tutorials/advanced
        },
        // highlight-end
        'tutorial-end',
      ],
    },
    // highlight-start
    {
      type: 'autogenerated',
      dirName: 'api', // Generate sidebar slice from docs/api
    },
    // highlight-end
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'Community',
      items: ['team', 'chat'],
    },
  ],
};
```

It would be resolved as:

```js title="sidebars.js"
export default {
  mySidebar: [
    'intro',
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'Tutorials',
      items: [
        'tutorial-intro',
        // highlight-start
        // Two files in docs/tutorials/easy
        'easy1',
        'easy2',
        // highlight-end
        'tutorial-medium',
        // highlight-start
        // Two files and a folder in docs/tutorials/advanced
        'advanced1',
        'advanced2',
        {
          type: 'category',
          label: 'read-more',
          items: ['resource1', 'resource2'],
        },
        // highlight-end
        'tutorial-end',
      ],
    },
    // highlight-start
    // Two folders in docs/api
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'product1-api',
      items: ['api'],
    },
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'product2-api',
      items: ['basic-api', 'pro-api'],
    },
    // highlight-end
    {
      type: 'category',
      label: 'Community',
      items: ['team', 'chat'],
    },
  ],
};
```

Note how the autogenerate source directories themselves don't become categories: only the items they contain do. This is what we mean by "sidebar slice".

</details>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_720d606f

segments.source_content: ## Category index convention {#category-index-convention}

translations.zh-hant: ## 分類索引慣例 {#category-index-convention}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus can automatically link a category to its index document.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 能自動將分類連結至其索引文件。

segments.source_content: A category index document is a document following one of those filename conventions:

translations.zh-hant: 分類索引文件需符合以下文件名慣例之一：

segments.source_content:
- Named as `index` (case-insensitive): `docs/Guides/index.md`
- Named as `README` (case-insensitive): `docs/Guides/README.mdx`
- Same name as parent folder: `docs/Guides/Guides.md`

translations.zh-hant:
- 命名為 `index`（大小寫不敏感）：`docs/Guides/index.md`
- 命名為 `README`（大小寫不敏感）：`docs/Guides/README.mdx`
- 與父資料夾同名：`docs/Guides/Guides.md`

segments.source_content: This is equivalent to using a category with a [doc link](items.mdx#category-doc-link):

translations.zh-hant: 此功能等同於使用帶有[文件連結](items.mdx#category-doc-link)的分類：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_31b98214

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Naming your introductory document `README.md` makes it show up when browsing the folder using the GitHub interface, while using `index.md` makes the behavior more in line with how HTML files are served.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

將介紹性文件命名為 `README.md` 可使其在 GitHub 介面瀏覽資料夾時顯示，而使用 `index.md` 則更符合 HTML 文件的服務行為。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If a folder only has one index page, it will be turned into a link instead of a category. This is useful for **asset collocation**:

```
some-doc
├── index.md
├── img1.png
└── img2.png
```

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

若資料夾僅有一個索引頁面，該頁面將被轉為連結而非分類。此設計適用於**資源共置**情境：

```
some-doc
├── index.md
├── img1.png
└── img2.png
```

:::

segments.source_content:
<details>

<summary>Customizing category index matching</summary>

It is possible to opt out any of the category index conventions, or define even more conventions. You can inject your own `isCategoryIndex` matcher through the [`sidebarItemsGenerator`](#customize-the-sidebar-items-generator) callback. For example, you can also pick `intro` as another file name eligible for automatically becoming the category index.

```js title="docusaurus.config.js"
export default {
  plugins: [
    [
      '@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs',
      {
        async sidebarItemsGenerator({
          ...args,
          isCategoryIndex: defaultCategoryIndexMatcher, // The default matcher implementation, given below
          defaultSidebarItemsGenerator,
        }) {
          return defaultSidebarItemsGenerator({
            ...args,
            // highlight-start
            isCategoryIndex(doc) {
              return (
                // Also pick intro.md in addition to the default ones
                doc.fileName.toLowerCase() === 'intro' ||
                defaultCategoryIndexMatcher(doc)
              );
            },
            // highlight-end
          });
        },
      },
    ],
  ],
};
```

Or choose to not have any category index convention.

```js title="docusaurus.config.js"
export default {
  plugins: [
    [
      '@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs',
      {
        async sidebarItemsGenerator({
          ...args,
          isCategoryIndex: defaultCategoryIndexMatcher, // The default matcher implementation, given below
          defaultSidebarItemsGenerator,
        }) {
          return defaultSidebarItemsGenerator({
            ...args,
            // highlight-start
            isCategoryIndex() {
              // No doc will be automatically picked as category index
              return false;
            },
            // highlight-end
          });
        },
      },
    ],
  ],
};
```

The `isCategoryIndex` matcher will be provided with three fields:

- `fileName`, the file's name without extension and with casing preserved
- `directories`, the list of directory names _from the lowest level to the highest level_, relative to the docs root directory
- `extension`, the file's extension, with a leading dot.

For example, for a doc file at `guides/sidebar/autogenerated.md`, the props the matcher receives are

```js
const props = {
  fileName: 'autogenerated',
  directories: ['sidebar', 'guides'],
  extension: '.md',
};
```

The default implementation is:

```js
function isCategoryIndex({fileName, directories}) {
  const eligibleDocIndexNames = [
    'index',
    'readme',
    directories[0].toLowerCase(),
  ];
  return eligibleDocIndexNames.includes(fileName.toLowerCase());
}
```

</details>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_fcd10430

segments.source_content: ## Autogenerated sidebar metadata {#autogenerated-sidebar-metadata}

translations.zh-hant: ## 自動生成側邊欄中繼資料 {#autogenerated-sidebar-metadata}

segments.source_content: For handwritten sidebar definitions, you would provide metadata to sidebar items through `sidebars.js`; for autogenerated, Docusaurus would read them from the item's respective file. In addition, you may want to adjust the relative position of each item because, by default, items within a sidebar slice will be generated in **alphabetical order** (using file and folder names).

translations.zh-hant: 在手動定義的側邊欄中，您需透過 `sidebars.js` 提供中繼資料；而自動生成時，Docusaurus 會從各項目的對應檔案讀取。此外，您可能需要調整項目的相對位置，因為預設情況下，側邊欄片段內的項目會按**字母順序**（依檔案與資料夾名稱）生成。

segments.source_content: ### Doc item metadata {#doc-item-metadata}

translations.zh-hant: ### 文件項目中繼資料 {#doc-item-metadata}

segments.source_content: The `label`, `className`, and `customProps` attributes are declared in front matter as `sidebar_label`, `sidebar_class_name`, and `sidebar_custom_props`, respectively. Position can be specified in the same way, via `sidebar_position` front matter.

translations.zh-hant: `label`、`className` 與 `customProps` 屬性需在 front matter 中分別宣告為 `sidebar_label`、`sidebar_class_name` 與 `sidebar_custom_props`。位置則可透過 `sidebar_position` front matter 指定。

segments.source_content:
```md title="docs/tutorials/tutorial-easy.md"
---
# highlight-start
sidebar_position: 2
sidebar_label: Easy
sidebar_class_name: green
# highlight-end
---

# Easy Tutorial

This is the easy tutorial!
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_36948d49

segments.source_content: ### Category item metadata {#category-item-metadata}

translations.zh-hant: ### 分類項目中繼資料 {#category-item-metadata}

segments.source_content: Add a `_category_.json` or `_category_.yml` file in the respective folder. You can specify any category metadata and also the `position` metadata. `label`, `className`, `position`, and `customProps` will default to the respective values of the category's linked doc, if there is one.

translations.zh-hant: 在對應資料夾內新增 `_category_.json` 或 `_category_.yml` 檔案。您可指定任何分類中繼資料及 `position` 中繼資料。若分類有連結文件，`label`、`className`、`position` 與 `customProps` 將預設採用該文件對應值。

segments.source_content:
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="JSON">

```json title="docs/tutorials/_category_.json"
{
  "position": 2.5,
  "label": "Tutorial",
  "collapsible": true,
  "collapsed": false,
  "className": "red",
  "link": {
    "type": "generated-index",
    "title": "Tutorial overview"
  },
  "customProps": {
    "description": "This description can be used in the swizzled DocCard"
  }
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="YAML">

```yml title="docs/tutorials/_category_.yml"
position: 2.5 # float position is supported
label: 'Tutorial'
collapsible: true # make the category collapsible
collapsed: false # keep the category open by default
className: red
link:
  type: generated-index
  title: Tutorial overview
customProps:
  description: This description can be used in the swizzled DocCard
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_41a18260

segments.source_content:
:::info

If the `link` is explicitly specified, Docusaurus will not apply any [default conventions](#category-index-convention).

The doc links can be specified relatively, e.g. if the category is generated with the `guides` directory, `"link": {"type": "doc", "id": "intro"}` will be resolved to the ID `guides/intro`, only falling back to `intro` if a doc with the former ID doesn't exist.

You can also use `link: null` to opt out of default conventions and not generate any category index page.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

若明確指定 `link`，Docusaurus 將不套用任何[預設慣例](#category-index-convention)。

文件連結可相對指定，例如當分類由 `guides` 目錄生成時，`"link": {"type": "doc", "id": "intro"}` 會解析為 ID `guides/intro`，僅在前者不存在時才退回使用 `intro`。

您亦可使用 `link: null` 明確排除預設慣例，不生成分類索引頁面。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

The position metadata is only used **within a sidebar slice**: Docusaurus does not re-order other items of your sidebar.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

位置中繼資料僅用於**側邊欄片段內**：Docusaurus 不會重新排序側邊欄的其他項目。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Using number prefixes {#using-number-prefixes}

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用數字前綴 {#using-number-prefixes}

segments.source_content: A simple way to order an autogenerated sidebar is to prefix docs and folders by number prefixes, which also makes them appear in the file system in the same order when sorted by file name:

translations.zh-hant: 排序自動生成側邊欄的簡單方法是為文件和資料夾添加數字前綴，這也能讓它們在按文件名排序時以相同順序顯示在文件系統中：

segments.source_content:
```bash
docs
├── 01-Intro.md
├── 02-Tutorial Easy
│   ├── 01-First Part.md
│   ├── 02-Second Part.md
│   └── 03-End.md
├── 03-Tutorial Advanced
│   ├── 01-First Part.md
│   ├── 02-Second Part.md
│   ├── 03-Third Part.md
│   └── 04-End.md
└── 04-End.md
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_92fa9171

segments.source_content: To make it **easier to adopt**, Docusaurus supports **multiple number prefix patterns**.

translations.zh-hant: 為了**降低採用門檻**，Docusaurus 支援**多種數字前綴模式**。

segments.source_content: By default, Docusaurus will **remove the number prefix** from the doc id, title, label, and URL paths.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，Docusaurus 會**移除數字前綴**，不會將其包含在文檔 ID、標題、標籤和 URL 路徑中。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

**Prefer using [additional metadata](#autogenerated-sidebar-metadata)**.

Updating a number prefix can be annoying, as it can require **updating multiple existing Markdown links**:

```diff title="docs/02-Tutorial Easy/01-First Part.md"
- Check the [Tutorial End](../04-End.mdx);
+ Check the [Tutorial End](../05-End.mdx);
```

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

**建議優先使用[附加元數據](#autogenerated-sidebar-metadata)**。

更新數字前綴可能很麻煩，因為這可能需要**修改多個現有的 Markdown 連結**：

```diff title="docs/02-Tutorial Easy/01-First Part.md"
- 查看 [教程結尾](../04-End.mdx);
+ 查看 [教程結尾](../05-End.mdx);
```

:::

segments.source_content: ## Customize the sidebar items generator {#customize-the-sidebar-items-generator}

translations.zh-hant: ## 自訂側邊欄項目生成器 {#customize-the-sidebar-items-generator}

segments.source_content: You can provide a custom `sidebarItemsGenerator` function in the docs plugin (or preset) config:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在文檔插件（或預設配置）中提供自訂的 `sidebarItemsGenerator` 函數：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0e8f4883
